[[inst_lbu]]
==== LBU

*Syntax:* lbu [SrcL, SrcR<{.sw,.uw}><<<shamt>], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Load 8-bit unsigned byte from memory at effective address.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_lbu.svg[LBU encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA/BASE_REG
